newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey says four dead in clashes with Kurd rebels.
newsitem.headline: Turkey says four dead in clashes with Kurd rebels.

text.p: Three Turkish soldiers and a Kurdish guerrilla have died in fighting in the mountainous east of the country, a security official said on Friday.
The four died in two separate clashes between Turkish soldiers and Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) rebels in Tunceli province on Thursday evening, the official said.
Around 5,000 Turkish soldiers launched an operation backed by helicopter gunships in search of PKK guerrillas following the fighting.
More than 20,000 people have been killed in the PKK's 12-year-old armed struggle for autonomy or independence in the southeast of the country.
